alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing; South Aitkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 5:21PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHWESTERN AITKIN AND SOUTHEASTERN CROW WING COUNTIES THROUGH 545 PM CDT... At 520 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Garrison, or 8 miles southwest of Mille Lacs Lake, moving southeast at 25 mph. Accumulating pea size hail has been observed with this storm in the Brainerd area. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Aitkin and southeastern Crow Wing Counties, including the following locations... Pine Center and Camp Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
